author: Alberto Garaffoni
date: Revisado en Italia el 24 de junio de 2024

title: A good entry-point machine, but requires modifications to make it really good
body: To make this machine works well, it is requires quite a few mods, like changing the OPV to 9 Bars, having a better naked portafilter, and best of you add a PID to control the temperature, otherwise getting a repetitive good results are quite hard. So, you may consider a different machine, but the good side is that it is a simple machine for maintenance and all this mods are widely available and relatively simple to do.
author: O. Olansky
date: Revisado en Italia el 10 de marzo de 2024
